title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 461.7 - Transfer of case
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 461.7 - Transfer of case

State Regulations
(a) In the
absence, disability or disqualification of an administrative law judge or for
other good cause, a case assigned to an administrative law judge may be
transferred to another administrative law judge chosen by the chief
administrative law judge, a principal administrative law judge or a senior
administrative law judge. (b) By
order of the chief administrative law judge, a principal administrative law
judge, a senior administrative law judge or the administrative law judge, a
case may be transferred from one place of hearing to another for the
convenience of parties or witnesses and as the interests of justice may
require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
461.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
